item.title: Need help with a code Im going to make
item.dc:creator: @freakolivier freakolivier
item.description:
@freakolivier wrote:

Ok, im going to add this code in my server but
when i type something like ::strength (name)
It DCs me, and gives this error:

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1 at client.customCommand(client.java:10119) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:20700) at client.packetProcess(client.java:14328) at client.process(client.java:14298) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136) at server.main(server.java:45)

this is the code:
so idk what the problem is, im using Testscape Source

if (command.startsWith("strength") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 2) { String name = command.substring(5); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.addSkillXP(462280000, 2); c.sendMessage("there you go "+playerName+" gave you strength lvls! :D"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (command.startsWith("attack") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 2) { String name = command.substring(5); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.addSkillXP(462280000, 0); c.sendMessage("there you go "+playerName+" gave you attack lvls! :D"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (command.startsWith("defence") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 2) { String name = command.substring(5); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.addSkillXP(462280000, 1); c.sendMessage("there you go "+playerName+" gave you defence lvls! :D"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (command.startsWith("defence1") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 2) { String name = command.substring(5); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.setSkillLevel(0, 1, playerLevel[1]); c.sendMessage("haha "+playerName+" Set ur defence lvl 1"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (command.startsWith("attack1") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 2) { String name = command.substring(5); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.setSkillLevel(0, 0, playerLevel[0]); c.sendMessage("haha "+playerName+" Set ur attack lvl 1"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (command.startsWith("strength1") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 2) { String name = command.substring(5); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.setSkillLevel(0, 2, playerLevel[2]); c.sendMessage("haha "+playerName+" Set ur strength lvl 1"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

[size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt]
[size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt]NO LEACHING
NO LEACHING
NO LEACHING[/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size]

Post here if u know what is causing this/ Or if u know how to fix
